Package oogasalad.editor.view

package oogasalad.editor.view
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    oogasalad.editor.view.resources
     
    oogasalad.editor.view.sprites
     
    oogasalad.editor.view.tools
     
  • Class
    Description
    AddConditionHandler
    Functional interface for handling the addition of a new condition within the editor view, typically used by ConditionsSectionBuilder.
    AddOutcomeHandler
    Functional interface for handling the addition of a new outcome within the editor view, typically used by OutcomesSectionBuilder.
    ConditionsSectionBuilder
    Builds the UI section for managing Conditions associated with an Event.
    DynamicVariableDialog
    A custom JavaFX Dialog for creating new DynamicVariable instances.
    EditConditionParamHandler
    Functional interface for handling the modification of a parameter associated with an existing condition within the editor view, typically used by ConditionsSectionBuilder.
    EditorApplication
    Simple JavaFX Application entry point for launching and testing the Editor UI independently.
    EditorComponentFactory
    Factory class responsible for creating the main UI components of the Editor scene.
    EditorGameView
    Displays a grid where visual game elements are added/updated.
    EditorViewListener
    Interface for components that need to be notified about changes originating from the EditorController or the underlying model state.
    EditOutcomeParamHandler
    Functional interface for handling the modification of a parameter associated with an existing outcome within the editor view, typically used by OutcomesSectionBuilder.
    EventsSectionBuilder
    Builds the UI section for managing Events in the Input Tab.
    InputTabComponentFactory
     
    OutcomesSectionBuilder
     
    PrefabPalettePane
    JavaFX Pane to display available prefabs (Blueprints) loaded from game-specific and global files.
    PropertiesTabComponentFactory
    Builds the "Properties" tab UI, displaying Identity invalid input: '&' Hitbox data, etc.
    RemoveConditionHandler
    Functional interface for handling the removal of an existing condition within the editor view, typically used by ConditionsSectionBuilder.
